summary: This is an email from a Deputy Assistant Inspector General discussing interviews related to Jeffrey Epstein's suicide risk assessment and the creation of a new will. It references interviews with Dr. MIE and another individual regarding decisions about Epstein's supervision.

persons.name: Dr. MIE
persons.context: Mentioned as being interviewed; her interview references a judge's order for a suicide risk assessment and Epstein making a new will on August 8.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referenced as the subject of a suicide risk assessment and as having made a new will on August 8.

connections.description: Dr. MIE's interview references Epstein's suicide risk assessment and his new will, indicating a professional or evaluative connection.
AW discussed the decision to step down Epstein with Dr. MIE, indicating a collaborative or consultative relationship.

events.title: Email discussing Epstein interviews
events.description: An email is sent referencing interviews about Epstein's suicide risk assessment and will.

events.title: Epstein creates new will
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein made a new will, as mentioned in Dr. MIE's interview.

keyFacts: Dr. MIE's interview references a judge's order for a suicide risk assessment for Jeffrey Epstein.
Dr. MIE mentions that Jeffrey Epstein made a new will on August 8.
AW discussed the decision to step down Epstein with Dr. MIE.
The email is from a Deputy Assistant Inspector General in the Office of the Inspector General, Department of Justice.
